title: 旧约 - 耶利米哀歌(Lamentations) - 第 3 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 耶利米哀歌(Lamentations) -- 第 3 章 ( 本篇共有 5 章 )

lineList.en: I AM the man that hath seen affliction by the rod of his wrath.
lineList.cn: 我是因耶和华忿怒的杖，遭遇困苦的人。

lineList.en: He hath led me, and brought me into darkness, but not into light.
lineList.cn: 他引导我，使我行在黑暗中，不行在光明里。

lineList.en: Surely against me is he turned; he turneth his hand against me all the day.
lineList.cn: 他真是终日再三反手攻击我。

lineList.en: My flesh and my skin hath he made old; he hath broken my bones.
lineList.cn: 他使我的皮肉枯乾。他折断（或作压伤）我的骨头。

lineList.en: He hath builded against me, and compassed me with gall and travail.
lineList.cn: 他筑垒攻击我，用苦楚（原文作苦胆）和艰难围困我。

lineList.en: He hath set me in dark places, as they that be dead of old.
lineList.cn: 他使我住在幽暗之处，像死了许久的人一样。

lineList.en: He hath hedged me about, that I cannot get out: he hath made my chain heavy.
lineList.cn: 他用篱笆围住我，使我不能出去。他使我的铜链沉重。

lineList.en: Also when I cry and shout, he shutteth out my prayer.
lineList.cn: 我哀号求救。他使我的祷告不得上达。

lineList.en: He hath inclosed my ways with hewn stone, he hath made my paths crooked.
lineList.cn: 他用凿过的石头挡住我的道。他使我的路弯曲。

lineList.en: He was unto me as a bear lying in wait, and as a lion in secret places.
lineList.cn: 他向我如熊埋伏，如狮子在隐密处。

lineList.en: He hath turned aside my ways, and pulled me in pieces: he hath made me desolate.
lineList.cn: 他使我转离正路，将我撕碎，使我凄凉。

lineList.en: He hath bent his bow, and set me as a mark for the arrow.
lineList.cn: 他张弓将我当作箭靶子。

lineList.en: He hath caused the arrows of his quiver to enter into my reins.
lineList.cn: 他把箭袋中的箭射入我的肺腑。

lineList.en: I was a derision to all my people; and their song all the day.
lineList.cn: 我成了众民的笑话。他们终日以我为歌曲。

lineList.en: He hath filled me with bitterness, he hath made me drunken with wormwood.
lineList.cn: 他用苦楚充满我，使我饱用茵？？。

lineList.en: He hath also broken my teeth with gravel stones, he hath covered me with ashes.
lineList.cn: 他又用沙石碜断我的牙，用灰尘将我蒙蔽。

lineList.en: And thou hast removed my soul far off from peace: I forgat prosperity.
lineList.cn: 你使我远离平安，我忘记好处。

lineList.en: And I said, My strength and my hope is perished from the LORD:
lineList.cn: 我就说，我的力量衰败。我在耶和华那里毫无指望。

lineList.en: Remembering mine affliction and my misery, the wormwood and the gall.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你记念我如茵？？和苦胆的困苦窘迫。

lineList.en: My soul hath them still in remembrance, and is humbled in me.
lineList.cn: 我心想念这些，就在里面忧闷。

lineList.en: This I recall to my mind, therefore have I hope.
lineList.cn: 我想起这事，心里就有指望。

lineList.en: It is of the LORD's mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not.
lineList.cn: 我们不致消灭，是出于耶和华诸般的慈爱。是因他的怜悯不致断绝。

lineList.en: They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.
lineList.cn: 每早晨，这都是新的。你的诚实极其广大。

lineList.en: The LORD is my portion, saith my soul; therefore will I hope in him.
lineList.cn: 我心里说，耶和华是我的分，因此，我要仰望他。

lineList.en: The LORD is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him.
lineList.cn: 凡等候耶和华，心里寻求他的，耶和华必施恩给他。

lineList.en: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 人仰望耶和华，静默等候他的救恩，这原是好的。

lineList.en: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
lineList.cn: 人在幼年负轭，这原是好的。

lineList.en: He sitteth alone and keepeth silence, because he hath borne it upon him.
lineList.cn: 他当独坐无言，因为这是耶和华加在他身上的。

lineList.en: He putteth his mouth in the dust; if so be there may be hope.
lineList.cn: 他当口贴尘埃，或者有指望。

lineList.en: He giveth his cheek to him that smiteth him: he is filled full with reproach.
lineList.cn: 他当由人打他的腮颊，要满受凌辱。

lineList.en: For the LORD will not cast off for ever:
lineList.cn: 因为主必不永远丢弃人。

lineList.en: But though he cause grief, yet will he have compassion according to the multitude of his mercies.
lineList.cn: 主虽使人忧愁，还要照他诸般的慈爱发怜悯。

lineList.en: For he doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.
lineList.cn: 因他并不甘心使人受苦，使人忧愁。

lineList.en: To crush under his feet all the prisoners of the earth,
lineList.cn: 人将世上被囚的踹（原文作压）在脚下，

lineList.en: To turn aside the right of a man before the face of the most High,
lineList.cn: 或在至高者面前屈枉人，

lineList.en: To subvert a man in his cause, the LORD approveth not.
lineList.cn: 或在人的讼事上颠倒是非，这都是主看不上的。

lineList.en: Who is he that saith, and it cometh to pass, when the Lord commandeth it not?
lineList.cn: 除非主命定，谁能说成就成呢。

lineList.en: Out of the mouth of the most High proceedeth not evil and good?
lineList.cn: 祸福不都出于至高者的口吗。

lineList.en: Wherefore doth a living man complain, a man for the punishment of his sins?
lineList.cn: 活人因自己的罪受罚，为何发怨言呢。

lineList.en: Let us search and try our ways, and turn again to the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我们当深深考察自己的行为，再归向耶和华。

lineList.en: Let us lift up our heart with our hands unto God in the heavens.
lineList.cn: 我们当诚心向天上的神举手祷告。

lineList.en: We have transgressed and have rebelled: thou hast not pardoned.
lineList.cn: 我们犯罪背逆，你并不赦免。

lineList.en: Thou hast covered with anger, and persecuted us: thou hast slain, thou hast not pitied.
lineList.cn: 你自被怒气遮蔽，追赶我们。你施行杀戮，并不顾惜。

lineList.en: Thou hast covered thyself with a cloud, that our prayer should not pass through.
lineList.cn: 你以黑云遮蔽自己，以致祷告不得透入。

lineList.en: Thou hast made us as the offscouring and refuse in the midst of the people.
lineList.cn: 你使我们在万民中成为污秽和渣滓。

lineList.en: All our enemies have opened their mouths against us.
lineList.cn: 我们的仇敌都向我们大大张口。

lineList.en: Fear and a snare is come upon us, desolation and destruction.
lineList.cn: 恐惧和陷坑，残害和毁灭，都临近我们。

lineList.en: Mine eye runneth down with rivers of water for the destruction of the daughter of my people.
lineList.cn: 因我众民遭的毁灭，我就眼泪下流如河。

lineList.en: Mine eye trickleth down, and ceaseth not, without any intermission,
lineList.cn: 我的眼多多流泪，总不止息，

lineList.en: Till the LORD look down, and behold from heaven.
lineList.cn: 直等耶和华垂顾，从天观看。

lineList.en: Mine eye affecteth mine heart because of all the daughters of my city.
lineList.cn: 因我本城的众民，我的眼，使我的心伤痛。

lineList.en: Mine enemies chased me sore, like a bird, without cause.
lineList.cn: 无故与我为仇的追逼我，像追雀鸟一样。

lineList.en: They have cut off my life in the dungeon, and cast a stone upon me.
lineList.cn: 他们使我的命在牢狱中断绝，并将一块石头抛在我身上。

lineList.en: Waters flowed over mine head; then I said, I am cut off.
lineList.cn: 众水流过我头，我说，我命断绝了。

lineList.en: I called upon thy name, O LORD, out of the low dungeon.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我从深牢中求告你的名。

lineList.en: Thou hast heard my voice: hide not thine ear at my breathing, at my cry.
lineList.cn: 你曾听见我的声音。我求你解救，你不要掩耳不听。

lineList.en: Thou drewest near in the day that I called upon thee: thou saidst, Fear not.
lineList.cn: 我求告你的日子，你临近我，说，不要惧怕。

lineList.en: O LORD, thou hast pleaded the causes of my soul; thou hast redeemed my life.
lineList.cn: 主阿，你伸明了我的冤。你救赎了我的命。

lineList.en: O LORD, thou hast seen my wrong: judge thou my cause.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你见了我受的委屈。求你为我伸冤。

lineList.en: Thou hast seen all their vengeance and all their imaginations against me.
lineList.cn: 他们仇恨我，谋害我，你都看见了。

lineList.en: Thou hast heard their reproach, O LORD, and all their imaginations against me;
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你听见他们辱骂我的话，知道他们向我所设的计，

lineList.en: The lips of those that rose up against me, and their device against me all the day.
lineList.cn: 并那些起来攻击我的人口中所说的话，以及终日向我所设的计谋。

lineList.en: Behold their sitting down, and their rising up; I am their musick.
lineList.cn: 求你观看，他们坐下，起来，都以我为歌曲。

lineList.en: Render unto them a recompence, O LORD, according to the work of their hands.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你要按着他们手所作的向他们施行报应。

lineList.en: Give them sorrow of heart, thy curse unto them.
lineList.cn: 你要使他们心里刚硬，使你的咒诅临到他们。

lineList.en: Persecute and destroy them in anger from under the heavens of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 你要发怒追赶他们，从耶和华的天下除灭他们。
